page.title: 15Living in a village
page.content:
If you live in a village it is good because you can make friends better and more quickly.Also you have more room to have a garden. You can go for walks in woods and fields and there are animals.You are very lucky if you live in a village because at night you can get to sleep but in a town you can't because of the traffic. You can picnic in a village but in a town you can't because there are fumes and too many cars. (Louise....9yrs.old)
I like it in the village because it is quieter and it is pretty. There is a lot of grass to play on. There is one thing that I don't like about our village. It has not got any shops so if you have not got a car you cannot go shopping. (Lisa..7yrs.old)
